on the Peacock Sutra
thirty-six phrases

source_sentence: 十二行即界二十四降可得也。
translation: The twelve practices that are the twenty-four descents of the elements are also obtainable.
(Skt. wan ii)

source_sentence: 十二行即界四十四降可得也。
translation: The twelve practices that are the forty-four descents of the elements can also be obtained.
(Go)
the text is twenty lines long, i.e., four bounds
"The ten subjugations are also...

textual organization of the thirty-eight practices

source_sentence: 即可得七十六降也加漢語八十六降也。
translation: That is, it's possible to attain seventy-six descents, plus the Han expression eighty-six descents.
It's found in the Kongqiao jing
this truth
seven words also
He attains the level of one hundred and two descents.
Second Sutra on the Peacock
Kongqiao jing a true saying

source_sentence: 寶曆八(戊寅)歲三月日令沙門王開書寫焉了南嶽金剛峯寺沙門本初密門謹誌天保十二年辛丑秋八月廿三日以新別所圓通寺藏本自手書寫訖此本與現本經相違多在之追而可校耳。
translation: On the third day of the eighth (wuyin) year of the Baoji era, the order was given to the monk Wang Kai to write the scriptures in his own hand, which were contradictory to the present scriptures and could be checked by the first monk of the Jingangfeng Temple in Nanyue.

source_sentence: 末資亮瑞(生年四十三歲)
translation: Mañjuśrī (born at the age of forty-three)
